title: How to Make Blackcurrant Jasmine Tea Mix

steps.headline: Tip all of the ingredients into a small bowl.
Pour the mix into an airtight tea canister until ready for use.
steps.description: The mixture can also be used immediately, as it does not require infusion during storage.

steps.headline: Place the tea into a teapot or teabag cover or infuser.
Serve.
steps.description: If you have blackcurrant flavored treats, serve these with the tea as well.

text: Preparing the Mixture Tip all of the ingredients into a small bowl.  Gently mix the ingredients together.  Pour the mix into an airtight tea canister until ready for use. The mixture can also be used immediately, as it does not require infusion during storage. Making the Tea Place the tea into a teapot or teabag cover or infuser. Steep for 3 to 5 minutes. Serve. If you have blackcurrant flavored treats, serve these with the tea as well.
